issue.title: [Go] Expose the bitutil package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6648](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6648). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Please allow the `bitutil` package to be exposed to external developers. The package provides useful utilities for constructing a bitmap and it is needed if you want to create an external builder implementation that handles null values.

Thank you.
